Package g41.si2022.util.db

Class Database

java.lang.Object
g41.si2022.util.db.DbUtil
g41.si2022.util.db.Database
public class Database extends DbUtil
Encapsula los datos de acceso JDBC, lectura de la configuracion y scripts de base de datos para creacion y carga.

    • insertBulk

      public Pair<String,Object[]> insertBulk(String tableName, String[] dataColumns, List<? extends DTO> data, ArrayList<Function<DTO,Object>> dataSuppliers)
      insertBulk. This method will insert multiple entries in one query. Note that this method's complexity is O(3*n+n^2).
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table that the data should be inserted to
      dataColumns - Name of the columns that will be inserted
      data - List of DTOs
      dataSuppliers - Functions that will supply each value for each entry in the List of DTOs.
      Returns:
      Pair containing the Query as a String and the Array of Object consisting of the values passed to the query.
